metadata.description: The Senate confirmation hearing for Brett Kavanaugh, President Donald Trump's U.S. Supreme Court pick, opened in chaos on Tuesday, as Democrats complained about Republicans blocking access to documents stemming from the nominee's previous work in the White House under President George W. Bush.

metadata.title: Massachusetts congressional match-up mirrors New York Democratic upset | Reuters
metadata.description: A 10-term Democratic congressman will try to fend off a challenge on Tuesday from a Boston city councilor who could become Massachusetts' first black congresswoman in a race with parallels to a New York upset that rattled the party in June.

metadata.title: Top U.S. general warns against major assault on Syria's Idlib | Reuters

metadata.title: U.S. construction spending rises slightly in July
metadata.description: U.S. construction spending barely rose in July as increases in homebuilding and investment in public projects were overshadowed by a sharp drop in private nonresidential outlays.
metadata.keywords: Economy, Real estate, U.S. Economy, Real Estate, US Economy, business news
metadata.ogTitle: US construction spending rises slightly in July
metadata.ogDescription: U.S. construction spending barely rose in July as increases in homebuilding and investment in public projects were overshadowed by a sharp drop in private nonresidential outlays.
metadata.twitterTitle: US construction spending rises slightly in July
metadata.twitterDescription: U.S. construction spending barely rose in July as increases in homebuilding and investment in public projects were overshadowed by a sharp drop in private nonresidential outlays.
metadata.newsKeywords: construction spending, ISM manufacturing,u.s. economy, economic data

nodes.title: Kremlin dismisses Trump warning on Syria's Idlib
nodes.cleanedCompare: kremlin dismissed president trump's warning syria launch offensive rebel-held enclave idlib tuesday area nest terrorism dismisses syria's

metadata.title: Kremlin dismisses Trump warning on Syria's Idlib | Reuters
metadata.description: The Kremlin dismissed U.S. President Donald Trump's warning to Syria not to launch an offensive in the rebel-held enclave of Idlib, saying on Tuesday that the area was a "nest of terrorism".

nodes.title: Scandal-hit USA Gymnastics says Perry out as CEO
nodes.cleanedCompare: usa gymnastics tuesday chief executive kerry perry resign year job sport's national governing body recover scandal team doctors sexually abused hundreds female athletes scandal-hit ceo

metadata.title: Scandal-hit USA Gymnastics says Perry out as CEO | Reuters
metadata.description: USA Gymnastics said on Tuesday that its chief executive, Kerry Perry, would resign after less than a year in the job as the sport's national governing body tries to recover from a scandal in which one of its team doctors sexually abused hundreds of female athletes.
metadata.keywords: US,GYMNASTICS,USA,Children / Youth Issues,Gymnastics,Key Personnel Changes,Sport,Sex Crimes,Picture available,Michigan,Crime,Pictures,United States

nodes.title: Toobin: Trump tweet attacking Sessions over indictments ‘may be an impeachable offense’
nodes.cleanedCompare: cnn legal analyst jeffrey toobin tuesday president trump's attacks attorney general jeff sessions charges brought gop lawmakers grounds impeachment tweet attacking indictments impeachable offense

metadata.title: Toobin: Trump tweet attacking Sessions over indictments ‘may be an impeachable offense’ | TheHill
metadata.description: CNN legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin said Tuesday that President Trump's attacks against Attorney General Jeff Sessions over charges brought against two GOP lawmakers may be grounds for impeachment.
metadata.keywords: ,Duncan Hunter, Jeff Sessions, Chris Collins, Donald Trump, Joe Manchin, Ben Sasse,

metadata.title: Fox News legal analyst: Trump tweets about indictments ‘fodder’ for Mueller probe | TheHill
metadata.description: Fox News senior judicial analyst Andrew Napolitano said Tuesday that President Trump's attacks against Attorney General Jeff Sessions over charges brought against GOP lawmakers are "fodder" for special counsel Robert Mueller.
